text: 49|9|Agar du guruh az mu'minon ʙo ham dargir sudand, mijonason osti ʙarqaror kuned va agar jak guruh ʙar digare tacovuz kard, ʙo guruhi mutacoviz ʙicanged, to ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo ʙoz ojad; agar ʙozgast, ʙajnason sulhe odilona ʙarqaror kuned va ʙa adolat raftor kuned, ki Alloh taolo odilonro dust dorad
